TopicTitle: Skilfull and Boat Parts on Mac?

Articles.Content:
i'm new to KSP and have a Mac, i'm having some problems with skilfull and the boat parts mod. I would like to know about the controls and some troubleshooting. Most of my problems are controls.:confused::confused:

PS. some of the controls in the manual refer to keys which i don't have on my mac. And i can't seem to load ordanance on hardpoints even though i right click on the hardpoints select warhead type and ordanance then click load. n

Edited July 10, 2014 by kavi
They both have user manuals. Read them and most of your questions will be answered.
Thanks alot! It answed most but one, when i deploy a boat the camera view is from under the craft and i have no control whatsoever of the craft
I never used this mod but.. did it run out of electricity? If there are no kerbals in obviously
